content:
Whilst walking our development team through some of the intricacies of FHIR, I was asked a question as to what people use "Resource.implicitRules" for. Personally, I have never seen anyone use them in the implementations that I have seen, or in any remote systems we have integrated with.

So, a question to the community. Do you use the "Resource.implicitRules" element? If so how do you use it?

thanks.
An equally important question - does your software check to make sure it's not set or is recognized so you know you can safely process the instance?
I have code in various places to make sure it's not true. I've seen use of it proposed on one context, but that was due to a misunderstanding, and it wasn't adopted.
